.NET Distinguished by proactive risk management and innovative problem solving, my approach ensures delivery of high-
impact results.

Professional Summary 
 
Client : United Parcel Service (UPS)      Employer : Cognizant Technology Solutions 
Location: Alpharetta, GA       June 2016 – Current 
Role: Tech Lead / Sr. Dot Net Developer 
 
Description: 
• United Parcel Service (UPS) is an American multinational package delivery company and a provider of supply 
chain management solutions. 
• Along with the central package delivery operation, it has many divisions and subsidiaries, including its cargo 
airline (UPS Airlines), freight-based trucking operation (UPS Freight, formerly Overnight Transportation), and 
retail-based packing and shipping centers. 
• I am part of a Shipping System Team, which builds the integration of ware house management systems with shipping systems 
like ConnectShip, e2Open.  
 
 
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
• Leading a team of 10 member.  
• Participate in designing the project based on the .Net Framework architecture.

like ConnectShip, e2Open.  
 
 
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
• Leading a team of 10 member.  
• Participate in designing the project based on the .Net Framework architecture. 
• Hands on development experience with a focus on .NET applications utilizing C#, API, WCF, RESTful and microservices.  
• Participate in Agile/Scrum methodology for development to ensure teamwork, collaboration, and process adaptability 
throughout the life cycle of the project. 
• Utilized SQL Server, Oracle, Azure SQL Server CosmosDB for database management.  
• Preparation of project plan by identifying the tasks, milestones involved in the application. 
• SME for shipping applications. 
• UI design based on HTML5, CSS3, ASP.Net MVC 5, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap. 
• Involved in debugging and troubleshooting User interface screens 
• Responsible for developing and consuming Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

• Involved in debugging and troubleshooting User interface screens 
• Responsible for developing and consuming Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 
• Collaborate with other shipping systems to support shipping. ( Example: e2Open for FedEx, SortedPro, ATS) 
• Extensive use of Web Services, SOAP, XML, XSL,XSLT,JSON to expose the reports to facilitate information sharing. 
• Responsible for writing SQL Queries and Stored Procedures 
• Developed and consumed RESTful Services using WEB API 
• SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) for Developers 
• Responsible for understanding the user requirements and converting them into the coding by 
implementing the business rules using C#. 
• Worked on SOAP and RESTFUL Service API using WCF 4.0 which return XML and JSON data using WCF attributes. 
• For team collaboration and for Source Code Control Used Team Foundation Server (TFS) and GIT. 
• Worked on Agile Platform using Team Foundation Server.

• For team collaboration and for Source Code Control Used Team Foundation Server (TFS) and GIT. 
• Worked on Agile Platform using Team Foundation Server. 
• Exposing the Asp.Net by creating WCF Services over SOAP/HTTP. 
• Involved in the code review and assignment of tasks with team members. 
• Involved in providing Unit Test for each of the task and also perform code review for the team. 
• Involved in pre-testing the application and bug fixing. 
• Design and implementation Integration of server-side services with SOAP UI services. 
• Developed import package to import data from Excel, CSV files into SQL server using SSIS. 
• Involved in Deployment and Maintenance of the project between various environments such as 
development, production and testing. 
• Used CI/CD pipeline for code Deployments. 
• Create and Update the process flow diagrams using Microsoft Visio 
• Design custom labels as per the needs

development, production and testing.

• Developed multiple tools for users for configuring the shippers, services, carriers to perform their day-to-day work.  
 
Environment: Visual Studio .Net 2017/2019, Angular 14+, Type script 2.5+, Visual Studio Code, C#, MS SQL Server, IIS 7.0, 
Microsoft Team Foundation Server, ASP.NET MVC 5, HTML5, CSS3, Rest, TFS, PSQL, JavaScript, JSON, jQuery, Bootstrap, Stored 
Procedures, XML, XSLT, Crystal Reports, Post Man, SoapUI, Figma

XL Insurance        Employer : Cognizant Technology Solutions 
Location: Hartford, CT       November 2012 – June 2016 
Role: Sr. Dot Net Developer 
 
Description: 
Applications handled are used by users to make submissions, quote, policies and also claims for specific process. The 
system of records is stored in AS400 Genius system.  
 
 
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
  
• Responsible to handle complex applications for underwriters.  
• Involved in complete Life Cycle including Analysis, Design, Development and Testing.  
• Analyzed user stories and use cases to create technical design that meet customer needs.  
• Share the weekly/monthly reports to the reporting managers  
• Designed Graphical User Interphase (GUI) using Layout Pages, HTML, JavaScript, CSS classes and 
• Coordinating with clients and delivering high-quality desktop applications. 
• Understanding and analyzing business processes, applications, and systems.

• Coordinating with clients and delivering high-quality desktop applications. 
• Understanding and analyzing business processes, applications, and systems. 
• Responsible for making AJAX Calls for the UI Interactions to the Controller Actions using jQuery and 
getting the Data back as JSON and parsing it onto the UI. 
• Involved in writing data access layers with C# and ADO.NET. 
• Generating reports using SQL Reporting Services. 
• Used Ajax Tool Kit to increase the functionality of the web page (i.e., asynchronous functionality) used 
master page and used user controls when ever need in the web page. 
• Used Angular JS as the development framework to build a single-page application. 
• Create SOAP based WCF service as well as Restful Web API to send and receive web service messages 
• and converted the JSON format data to XML. 
• Used TFS (Team Foundation Server) as a Version Control System

• and converted the JSON format data to XML. 
• Used TFS (Team Foundation Server) as a Version Control System 
 
Environment: Visual Studio .Net 2017/2019, C#, MS SQL Server, IIS 7.0, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, ASP.NET, HTML5, 
CSS3, TFS, PSQL, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Stored Procedures, XML, SoapUI
